name: Five Nights at Backrooms
description:
Story

After you get separated from your team during your exploration of the backrooms you find a room that looks like an office. After you enter the room hoping to find a way out, you trigger an alarm. Entities will now start coming toward you. Survive for 5 days and your team will rescue you.

Gameplay

For the first 4 nights, you will have to deal with a new entity and a new mechanic every night. The Fith night will be the harder version of the fourth night.

This is the second game I ever made so there will probably be some bugs, I have also never used blender before so the entities and the rooms don't look too good.
